name: Oncoming Shooter
description:
I was inspired to work on this project after playing a few similar mobile games that relied mostly on luck and chance rather than skill and precision. I wanted to make my own take on the genre. 

This still needs a lot of work, like to make the game look more interesting and have more sound effects, but the core concept is solid enough that I believe the project can continue.

Controls are simple: Left click to shoot, mouse to aim, W and S keys to move the shooter up and down.
